text: Radio Days is a 1987 American comedy drama movie directed by Woody Allen (who also stars) and starring Danny Aiello, Dianne Wiest, Hy Anzell, Seth Green, Jeff Daniels, Larry David, Mia Farrow, Todd Field, Wallace Shawn, Diane Keaton, Julie Kavner, Kenneth Walsh, Rebecca Schaeffer. It was distributed by Orion Pictures and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1988. ==Other websites== * Category:1987 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:American independent movies Category:Movies set in Brooklyn Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in the 1940s
title: Radio Days
